about_the_game:
You are an ex-member of the Federation Rangers, with the call-sign of Rusty. Years ago, you helped defeat the massive Stellaris Empire and free the entire Quiper Spiral from their tyranny. Now you’re just a washed-up nomad with nowhere to go. Until the day comes that you come across Quippy, a lost little alien separated from the rest of its people. Renewed with purpose, you resolve to bring Quippy back to its home. But the galaxy can be a dangerous place, and just about every hostile faction out there seems determined to get their hands on Quippy by any means necessary...

  • Match tiles and blast foes in this shoot-em-up puzzle hybrid!
  • Bust through corroded robots, monstrous food, and noxious pirates across Story Mode's 5 different systems, each with its massive boss battle!
  • Select a ship, equip multiple categories of weapons, and upgrade each of them with crafting materials.
  • Learn the patterns of each of BlackSky's 25 enemies!
  • Play through a massive amount of level-scaled missions in The Infinite Expanse!
detailed_description:
You are an ex-member of the Federation Rangers, with the call-sign of Rusty. Years ago, you helped defeat the massive Stellaris Empire and free the entire Quiper Spiral from their tyranny. Now you’re just a washed-up nomad with nowhere to go. Until the day comes that you come across Quippy, a lost little alien separated from the rest of its people. Renewed with purpose, you resolve to bring Quippy back to its home. But the galaxy can be a dangerous place, and just about every hostile faction out there seems determined to get their hands on Quippy by any means necessary...

  • Match tiles and blast foes in this shoot-em-up puzzle hybrid!
  • Bust through corroded robots, monstrous food, and noxious pirates across Story Mode's 5 different systems, each with its massive boss battle!
  • Select a ship, equip multiple categories of weapons, and upgrade each of them with crafting materials.
  • Learn the patterns of each of BlackSky's 25 enemies!
  • Play through a massive amount of level-scaled missions in The Infinite Expanse!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7-Core Apple GPU or AMD Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: BlackSky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Travel from one solar system to the other in this space action puzzle game. Match tiles to fire your ship's deadly weapons at a multitude of monsters. Upgrade your ship and its weapons to fight stronger enemies
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
